timeline.bodyText: I'd put a period at the end so we're consistent with the other descriptions. I'd also use https as the protocol; it's subtle, but it would be a little bit of encouragement/reminder to use HTTPS instead of HTTP.
timeline.author: ayoho
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -96,7 +96,7 @@ tokenEndpointAuthMethod=Authentication method
 tokenEndpointAuthMethod.desc=Specifies required authentication method.
 
 redirectToRPHostAndPort=Callback host and port number
-redirectToRPHostAndPort.desc=Specifies a callback host and port number.
+redirectToRPHostAndPort.desc=Specifies a callback protocol, host, and port number. For example, http://myhost:8020

replies.bodyText: Reviewing on the ID side. Agree with @ayoho on the above suggested edits.
replies.author: ManasiGandhi
